comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: See our craft template based on this snowflake here. And click here to read more on THE BIGGER PICTURE blog about the "Snowflake Bentley" photographs in this set and to see how you can use this template for your holiday decor and crafting (garlands, cards, ornaments, tree toppers). Warm wishes, Catherine Shteynberg Smithsonian Institution Archives
